title: cryptoheadd
author: cryptoheadd
content: Up for auction: Lot 1: 2017 Polymerbit 10mETH Error note & 10mBTC Test Print Set with Signed holderMore information on mETH: https://wiki.coin.community/Polymerbit_-_10_mETH_(Polymer_Test_Print)mBTC: https://wiki.coin.community/Polymerbit_-_10_mBTC_(Polymer_Test_Print)The mETH note is an error note with "Bitcoin 2017 document" written on it. (1 of 30)Lot 2: Polymerbit 0.1 BTC #200 with signed holderThis was the first release of Polymerbit. More information on the same: https://wiki.coin.community/Polymerbit_-_0.1_BTCLot 3: Polymerbit 20 Viacoin Test note with holderCan't seem to find a coin wiki link for the same. This was one of the first altcoin prints of Polymerbit (Correct me if I'm wrong) More photos of the notes can be found here: https://imgur.com/a/tEuQTW3Starting Bid per lot:  0.0005 BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.0005 BTCÂ Ends: 13th October 2022 14:00:00 PDTCount Down for the same: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/launch?iso=20221013T14&p0=137&msg=Polymerbit+Auction&font=cursive&csz=1Shipping: Would be done via DHL. Cost: On actuals - should be around $25- Any bid made in last 5 minutes per lot, will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time per lot- If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made per lot, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid. (Thanks MJ for this)- Payment due within 24 hours of auction end
